prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Does Stefan realize how much he hurt me and that I won't be contacting him anymore, and what are his next actions or intentions for the next month?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below are the key points from the horary chart for your query, using strict horary principles:

1. Query Representations:
 • Melissa (querent) is represented by the Ascendant (1st house, beginning at 2° Aquarius), which contains the Sun (25° Aquarius), Mercury (28° Aquarius), Saturn (18°49′ Pisces), and Pluto (2° Aquarius).
 • Stefan is indicated by the 9th house (foreign connection) whose cusp begins at 1° Scorpio. The traditional ruler of Scorpio is Mars; Mars is located at 17° Cancer (in retrograde) within the 6th house.

2. Planetary Positions (as provided):
 • Sun: 25° Aquarius
 • Moon: 5°26′ Virgo
 • Mercury: 28°8′ Aquarius
 • Venus: 5°56′ Aries
 • Mars: 17°44′ Cancer (r)
 • Jupiter: 11°25′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 18°49′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°20′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°21′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°26′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29°11′ Pisces (r)
 • Chiron: 19°55′ Aries

3. House Distribution:
 • 1st House (Ascendant): Begins at 2° Aquarius – contains Sun, Mercury, Saturn, Pluto.
 • 2nd House: Begins at 19° Pisces – contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, Chiron.
 • 3rd House: Begins at 1° Taurus – contains Uranus.
 • 4th House: Begins at 26° Taurus – contains Jupiter.
 • 6th House: Begins at 3° Cancer – contains Mars.
 • 7th House: Begins at 2° Leo – contains Moon.
 • 9th House: Begins at 1° Scorpio (relevant for Stefan’s representation).
 • Remaining houses as listed are noted, with the top left quadrant essentially empty.

4. Major Aspects (those most relevant given their orbital proximity and potential influence):
 • Pluto Conjunction Ascendant (orb 0°) – intensifying the querent’s signature.
 • Sun Square IC (orb 1°) and Sun Square MC (orb 1°) – highlighting tension between personal and external/public factors.
 • Mercury Square IC (orb 2°) and Mercury Square MC (orb 2°) – emphasizing communication conflicts.
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb 2°) – suggesting sudden change or disruption.
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 1°) and Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 6°) – relating to Stefan’s significator (Mars) indicating determined yet unconventional action.
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 2°) – suggesting wounds or issues in the way Stefan expresses his assertiveness.
 • Additional aspects between Neptune, North Node, and other personal planets (e.g. Neptune Sextile IC, Neptune Trine MC) that contribute to a blend of idealism and hidden factors.

5. Patterns to Note:
 • A T-square formed between Mercury (28° Aquarius), MC (26° Scorpio), and IC (26° Taurus), with Uranus (23° Taurus) and Sun (25° Aquarius) as key participants. This pattern reinforces conflict between structure (Melissa’s conscious intent expressed through the Ascendant) and disruptive forces.
 • A Yod involving the Moon (5° Virgo), Ascendant (2° Aquarius), Venus (5° Aries), and Pluto (2° Aquarius). This points to a critical adjustment demanded by the emotional environment and transformative energies.
 • A Cradle pattern incorporating Uranus, MC, Ascendant, Neptune, IC, North Node, and Pluto. This composite configuration further supports the interplay between personal identity, external pressures, and evolving circumstances.

6. Special Chart Features:
 • The Moon is in its waning gibbous phase – suggesting a period of transition rather than new beginnings.
 • Emphasis on the Air element among the inner planets (notably Aquarius placements) alongside a dominance of fixed modalities.
 • Pluto rising and Uranus positioned at the Nadir with the IC – reinforcing themes of abrupt transformation in the querent’s personal and domestic life.
 • A preponderance of sextile aspects, indicating opportunities for integration amid tensions and challenges.

This list outlines the foundational data for further interpretation of whether Stefan has understood his hurtful actions and what his next intentions for the coming month might be. Confirm these elements to proceed with a strictly data-driven horary interpretation.

4. Major Aspects (those most relevant given their orbital proximity and potential influence):
 • Pluto Conjunction Ascendant (orb 0°) – intensifying the querent’s signature.
 • Sun Square IC (orb 1°) and Sun Square MC (orb 1°) – highlighting tension between personal and external/public factors.
 • Mercury Square IC (orb 2°) and Mercury Square MC (orb 2°) – emphasizing communication conflicts.
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb 2°) – suggesting sudden change or disruption.
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 1°) and Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 6°) – relating to Stefan’s significator (Mars) indicating determined yet unconventional action.
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 2°) – suggesting wounds or issues in the way Stefan expresses his assertiveness.
 • Additional aspects between Neptune, North Node, and other personal planets (e.g. Neptune Sextile IC, Neptune Trine MC) that contribute to a blend of idealism and hidden factors.

5. Patterns to Note:

 • A Yod involving the Moon (5° Virgo), Ascendant (2° Aquarius), Venus (5° Aries), and Pluto (2° Aquarius). This points to a critical adjustment demanded by the emotional environment and transformative energies.
 • A Cradle pattern incorporating Uranus, MC, Ascendant, Neptune, IC, North Node, and Pluto. This composite configuration further supports the interplay between personal identity, external pressures, and evolving circumstances.

 • The Moon is in its waning gibbous phase – suggesting a period of transition rather than new beginnings.
 • Emphasis on the Air element among the inner planets (notably Aquarius placements) alongside a dominance of fixed modalities.

This list outlines the foundational data for further interpretation of whether Stefan has understood his hurtful actions and what his next intentions for the coming month might be. Confirm these elements to proceed with a strictly data-driven horary interpretation.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the data in the horary chart, here is the interpretation:

1. Query Fundamentals:
 • The querent (Melissa) is clearly marked by the Ascendant in Aquarius—with the Sun, Mercury, Saturn, and Pluto present—indicating a powerful, transformative stance.
 • Stefan’s representation via the 9th house cusp (1° Scorpio) points to a foreign or distant influence, with Mars (traditional ruler of Scorpio) in Cancer (retrograde) in the 6th house suggesting emotional defensiveness, possible a wounded state, and practical issues affecting his actions.

2. Communication and Realization:
 • Mercury forms hard aspects (both squares to the IC and MC) which highlight communication blocks and misinterpretations in both private and public spheres. This implies that while Stefan may feel the sting of his actions, his internal processing is conflicted.
 • The T-square involving Mercury, the MC, and the IC reinforces that there is an intense tension between what is felt internally and what is expressed outwardly. This tension contributes to his lack of clear communicative resolution.
 • The conjunction of Pluto with the Ascendant, paired with a Yod involving the querent’s key planets, stresses that the underlying truth is powerful and transformative. The impact of Stefan’s hurt is significant, and on some level, he is likely to be aware of its weight.

3. Stefan’s Next Actions:
 • Mars in Cancer, especially in retrograde, indicates that his actions will be mired by emotional defensiveness and internal conflict. The retrograde motion lends to delays or hesitations.
 • The Mars trine Saturn suggests that if he directs his energy constructively, there is potential for a measured, if reluctant, response. However, Mars square Chiron points to unresolved emotional wounds interfering with his ability to act decisively and apologize or amend behavior.
 • The presence of disruptive aspects (notably Sun square Uranus) suggests that his behavior may continue to be unpredictable. He may attempt to justify, downplay, or mask his internal conflicts rather than offer straightforward resolution.
 • The Cradle pattern presence underlines that both the querent’s transformative energy and Stefan’s defensive impulses are intertwined in a delicate dynamic wherein significant change is labored and not readily forthcoming.

4. Overall Indications:
 • Stefan does show markers of recognizing, at least on an unconscious level, the harm he has caused. However, his current configuration leaves him trapped in conflicting urgencies: a part of him wishes to address the hurt in a mature manner, while another part remains vulnerable and conditioned to react defensively.
 • His next actions over the coming month are likely to be tentative and indirect. There is a suggestion that he may reach out in some fashion—perhaps a communication that is more oblique or half-formed rather than a full, heartfelt resolution. His moves, if any, will be cautious and likely more about managing his own discomfort than about offering genuine reparative peace for the pain caused.

Based on the chart’s aspects and house placements, Stefan’s realization is present but incomplete. The combination of hard aspects along the communicative sectors and a wounded significator (Mars) indicates that while there is some internal acknowledgment, he is not positioned to provide a clear, constructive counteraction within the coming month.

4. Overall Indications:
 • Stefan does show markers of recognizing, at least on an unconscious level, the harm he has caused. However, his current configuration leaves him trapped in conflicting urgencies: a part of him wishes to address the hurt in a mature manner, while another part remains vulnerable and conditioned to react defensively.
 • His next actions over the coming month are likely to be tentative and indirect. There is a suggestion that he may reach out in some fashion—perhaps a communication that is more oblique or half-formed rather than a full, heartfelt resolution. His moves, if any, will be cautious and likely more about managing his own discomfort than about offering genuine reparative peace for the pain caused.

Based on the chart’s aspects and house placements, Stefan’s realization is present but incomplete. The combination of hard aspects along the communicative sectors and a wounded significator (Mars) indicates that while there is some internal acknowledgment, he is not positioned to provide a clear, constructive counteraction within the coming month.
